page.title: 13Staythorpe Power Station
page.content: The 250,000 sq. metres is divided as follows: Buildings - 10%, Coal Stocks - 30%, Agriculture - 40%, Training area - 10%, Roads, Rail, Transformers - 10%. The staff consists of 285 manual workers, 16 office staff, 14 maintenance, 31 operators & 8 chemists. Only 11 staff can keep the staion functional overnight. The coal stocks will cope with industrial disputes for 6 months. Although many chemicals are used, pollution is practically nil and safety is given a high priority. The 2 cooling towers are 200 ft. high and in the more active newer section, the 3 chimneys are 270 ft. high. These along with the 2 main buildings dominate the skyline and are visible from many miles away.
